theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Change the look and feel of the application.

editorTheme.label: Editor Theme
editorTheme.description: Dynamically changes editor colors based on the current image.

exif.label: EXIF Library Sorting
exif.description: Read EXIF data (ISO, aperture, etc.) on folder load at the cost of slower folder loading when using EXIF sorting.

transparency.label: Transparency
transparency.enableMessage:
Are you sure you want to enable window transparency effects?

These effects may reduce application performance.

The application will relaunch to make this change.
transparency.disableMessage:
Are you sure you want to disable window transparency effects?

The application will relaunch to make this change.

dataActions.clearSidecarsMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete all sidecar files?

This will permanently remove all your edits for all images inside the current base folder and its subfolders.
dataActions.clearCacheMessage:
Are you sure you want to clear the thumbnail cache?

All thumbnails will need to be regenerated, which may be slow for large folders.
dataActions.clearAiTagsMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove all AI-generated tags from all images in the current base folder?

This will not affect user-added tags. This action cannot be undone.
dataActions.clearAllTagsMessage:
Are you sure you want to remove all AI-generated and user-added tags from all images in the current base folder?

This action cannot be undone.

processing.previewResolutionDescription: Adjust the resolution used for editor previews. Lower resolutions improve performance on slower machines.
processing.highlightCompressionDescription: Adjust how aggressively highlights are compressed in RAW files.
processing.backendDescription: Choose which graphics API to use for processing.
processing.linuxOptimizationDescription: Improves performance on Linux systems with certain GPUs.

shortcuts.taggingDescription: Quickly apply these tags using keyboard shortcuts in the library.

ai.providerDescription: Choose how AI features are processed.
ai.aiConnectorAddressDescription: Address of the AI Connector server (e.g., http://localhost:11434)

community.title: Community Presets
community.description: Discover presets created by the community.
community.featured: Want to get your preset featured?

noResults.title: No Results Found
noResults.search: Could not find an image based on filename or tags.
noResults.filter: No images found that match your filter.

indexing.title: Indexing Images
indexing.description: Please wait while we index your images...
